title: DDoS payload targeting
extract: An attacker implants a large payload* of data on an exposed memcached server. ... The targeted server or its surrounding infrastructure is unable to process the large amount of data sent from the memcached server, resulting in overload and denial-of-service to legitimate requests.
extract_html: An attacker implants a large payload* of data on an exposed memcached server. ... The targeted server or its surrounding infrastructure is unable to process the large amount of data sent from the memcached server, resulting in overload and denial-of-service to legitimate requests.
